summary: Music player site: set a specific uploaded track as the default, auto-play it on site load, and move the song selection bar to the top while keeping uploads enabled.

existing_features.title: Set the site’s default background music to the uploaded song whose filename starts with "Soch Na Sake" by making that track the runtime default audio asset at `frontend/public/assets/background-music.mp3` (replace/update the existing default music file as needed) while keeping the local file picker feature available.

Move the song selection control (the fixed-position song picker bar/button) from the bottom of the page to the upper side (top) of the page, without covering the existing top-right play/mute controls.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set uploaded track starting with "Soch Na Sake" as the default song in the site music player and auto-play it immediately on site load while keeping the upload feature unchanged.
Move the song selection bar from the bottom of the page to the upper side (top).

Ensure the default track attempts to auto-play immediately when the user opens the site, with the existing graceful fallback behavior (play-on-gesture via the Enter gate, and a visible manual "Play Music" button if needed) preserved.

projectName: Set 'Soch Na Sake…' as default autoplay track and move song picker to top
